display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
1. Coodinator 向 source task
触发 CP

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 45px; margin-left: 862px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
2. source完成CP
向coordinator 发送确认

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 247px; margin-left: 510px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
4. sink 收到所有上游barrier
进行CP，并持久化state

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 352px; margin-left: 505px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div:
5. sink 完成 CP
向coordinator发送确认

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 438px; margin-left: 233px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
6. coordinator 收到所有 ack
持久化本次 CP meta 到远端
